data.name: Marshadow

abilities.name: Let Loose
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may have each player shuffle their hand into their deck and draw 4 cards.

attacks.name: Shadow Punch
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

data.flavorText: Able to conceal itself in shadows, it never appears before humans, so its very existence was the stuff of myth.

data.name: Marshadow-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Shadow Hunt
abilities.text: This Pokémon can use the attacks of Basic Pokémon in your discard pile. (You still need the necessary Energy to use each attack.)

attacks.name: Peerless Hundred Blows-GX
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage times the number of basic Energy attached to this Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

data.name: Marshadow-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Shadow Hunt
abilities.text: This Pokémon can use the attacks of any Basic Pokémon in your discard pile. (You still need the necessary Energy to use each attack.)

attacks.name: Peerless Hundred Blows-GX
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage times the amount of basic Energy attached to this Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

data.name: Marshadow

abilities.name: Resetting Hole
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may discard any Stadium card in play. If you do, discard this Pokémon and all cards attached to it.

attacks.name: Red Knuckles
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is an Ultra Beast, this attack does 60 more damage.

data.flavorText: It slips into the shadows of others and mimics their powers and movements. As it improves, it becomes stronger than those it's imitating.

data.name: Marshadow & Machamp-GX
rules: TAG TEAM rule: When your TAG TEAM is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Revenge
attacks.text: If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack during their last turn, this attack does 90 more damage.

attacks.name: Acme of Heroism-GX
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), and if it would be Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack during their next turn, it is not Knocked Out, and its remaining HP becomes 10. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

data.name: Marshadow

attacks.name: Shadowy Echoes
attacks.text: Put a Basic Pokémon from each player's discard pile onto its owner's Bench.

attacks.name: Surprise Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

data.flavorText: Able to conceal itself in shadows, it never appears before humans, so its very existence was the stuff of myth.

data.name: Marshadow

attacks.name: Shadow Imitation
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokémon's non-GX attacks and use it as this attack.

data.flavorText: It slips into the shadows of others and mimics their powers and movements. As it improves, it becomes stronger than those it's imitating.

data.name: Marshadow

attacks.name: Rapid Hunt
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Rapid Strike cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Shadow Flicker
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is Knocked Out during your next turn, take 1 more Prize card.

data.flavorText: It sinks into the shadows of people and Pokémon, where it can understand their feelings and copy their capabilities.

attacks.name: Shadowy Side Kick
attacks.text: If your opponent's Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from this attack, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from and effects of attacks done to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Shadowy Side Kick
attacks.text: If your opponent's Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from this attack, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from and effects of attacks done to this Pokémon.
